Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Signiferin 2.1 (S2.1, XXA; UCLL1c; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: froglet skin,Crinia signiferin, Crinia deserticola, Australia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram+ B. cereus (IC50 25 uM), E. faecalis ATCC29212 (IC50 100 uM), L. lactis (IC50 12 uM), L. innocua (IC50 50 uM), M. luteus ATCC9341 (IC50 25 uM), S. aureus ATCC29213 (IC50 12 uM), S. epidermidis ATCC14990 (IC50 25 uM), S. uberis (IC50 25 uM), Gram- E.cloacae ATCC13047 (IC50 > 100 uM), and E.coli ATCC35218 (IC50 > 100 uM).Updaated 12/2024
Literature Information.Author: Maselli VM, Bilusich D, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ.2006
Literature Information.Title: Host-defence skin peptides of the Australian Streambank Froglet Crinia riparia: isolation and sequence determination by positive and negative ion electrospray mass spectrometry.
